Package com.pjv.Model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
com.pjv.Model.Board
public class Board extends Object
The Board class represents the game board containing pieces.

    • getPicName

      public String getPicName(int row, int col)
      Gets the picture name of the piece at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the piece
      col - the column index of the piece
      Returns:
      the picture name of the piece, or null if no piece exists at the specified position

      col - the column index of the piece
      Returns:
      the color of the piece, or null if no piece exists at the specified position
